name: 9 Levels of Hell
description:
9 Levels of Hell (9LH) is a collaboration game, there were two artist and three programmers working together as  a project, this group is known as Team 5 (T5). Development may be taken further than this prototype iteration. All of the game assets were created by the group with the feedback of peers and mentors. 9LH  was programmed in Game Maker Studio 2, over a period of part-time development in a single  month. The intended design of 9LH is to be challenging and fast paced with quick feedback to the player, as well as acquiring upgrades when you defeat the bosses and earning local based highscores through speed-running the game..

System requirements:
  • OS: Windows: 7, 8 and 10.
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 2GB
  • DirectX 11
  • Storage space: 5MB
Get in touch: Email: rampilowreal@gmail.com 

YouTube: RampilowGames

Twitter: @ZS_Ramp

Anywhere else: Rampilow Install instructions To download and install 9LH:

1. Download the 9LH.zip file from Itch.io.
2. Extract the 9LH.zip file to your desired location on your device.
3. Run the 9LevelsOfHell.exe file.
